title: A Chance decision
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Voyages and travels
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/China - Social life and customs
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Life change events
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Voyages and travels
abstract: 'When you think you understand something, you often find you don't'.
description: A chance decision led Graham Goulding into a teaching job in China where the banquets were endless and he and his colleagues were treated like royalty. A unique adventure that has remained with Goulding long after his return to Gippsland.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000892; Stories from Gippsland : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2007
